title: "Deep Learning-Based Spectrum Sensing in Space-Air-Ground Integrated Networks"
excerpt: "To complement terrestrial connections, the space-air-ground integrated network (SAGIN) has been proposed to provide wide-area connections with improved quality of experience (QoE). Spectrum management is an important issue in SAGIN due to the explosive proliferation of wireless devices and services."
